Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • swe2013.user.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Customer, Hotellier, TourismAssociation

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User Class representing all attirbutes and methods for users

    Anreiter Simon, Moser Victoria Dorothy, Kocman Andreas
